rsbNotes.title: Pr 3:13–20
rsbNotes.text: 3:13–20 This section is formed more as a hymn in praise of wisdom than as a piece of instruction (cf. Ps. 1). But see 8:32–36 for a practical conclusion.

rsbNotes.title: Pr 3:13
rsbNotes.text: 3:13 Blessed. The word does not mean merely a subjective feeling. It is found almost exclusively in the Psalms and the wisdom literature, describing the life that enjoys God’s grace and favor.

rsbNotes.title: Pr 3:14–15
rsbNotes.text: 3:14, 15 Job 28 describes wisdom as a treasure. Psalm 19:10 refers specifically to the revealed law.
